home_heading_subheading: Get easy access to products in your home to better plan your purchases, meals and time.
home_section1_heading: Create your own categories and add products
home_section1_subheading_one: The names of the categories are arranged alphabetically, which makes it easy to find them.
home_section1_subheading_two: Add your own pictures and photos.
home_section1_subheading_three: Manage not only food products but also household chemicals, cosmetics, office and school supplies, etc.
home_section2_subheading_one: Quickly add and remove the selected product.
home_section2_subheading_two: Check if the product has passed its expiry date
home_section3_subheading_one: Thanks to the search engine, you will find all similar products as well as a specific product.
home_section3_subheading_two: You can quickly check whether you have a given product in stock at any place and time.
home_section4_subheading_one: Share the account with your loved ones so that you can manage your pantry together.
home_section4_subheading_two: Any changes you make are immediately visible to everyone sharing the account.
home_section4_subheading_three: Check the notifications and you will find out if you have received a new invitation or if the person you invited to share your account has accepted it.
